desc: Users can download chart from a helm repo. The chart should be deployed successfully with it's all default values
Users can download a chart from a helm repo with a reference to a secret that has “user” and “password” defined for basic authentication GET request
Users can download a chart from git repo. The chart should be deployed successfully with it's all default values
Users can upgrade the chart deployment from git repo
Users can change their chart deployment (from git repo)by changing the HelmRelease spec fields
Users still can deploy their chart(from git repo)  successfully even though they define HelmRelease with spec fields which are not used in their chart
Users can change their chart(from git repo) deployment multiple times by changing the HelmRelease spec fields multiple times
